title: Smart Data Models - VsCapabilityCurve
description: Adapted from CIM data models. The P-Q capability curve for a voltage source converter, with P on x-axis and Qmin and Qmax on y1-axis and y2-axis.

type.description: Property. NGSI type. It has to be VsCapabilityCurve

VsConverterDCSides.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Capability curve of this converter. Default: 'list'
